entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [LSP] Investigate moving taskcompletionsource to queue item instead of callbacks #57221
  • Debugger fails to expand ref members in the same way it expands pointer members. #57220
  • [LSP] Ensure that handlers that ask for a document get a document or do not get called #57216
  • Complete Statement does not work for switch expressions #57213
  • Inconsistent val escape for extended property patterns #57209
  • Potential fixes missing add using statement in certain situations #57208
  • Need Refactor → Wrap all parameter → Align all for 'for' loop to break them into 3 lines for better readability #57205
  • VisualStudioActiveDocumentTracker doesn't handle all element IDs #57203
    17.1
  • Call Hierarchy window shows duplicates for multiple target frameworks #57202
  • False positive in IDE0078 (use of pattern matching) #57199
    17.1
  • Convert to file-scoped namespace refactoring isn't applicable at all levels #57198
  • CA1845: Analyzer not being offered when scenario is hit #57197

Closed

  • CS0103 fixer for missing LHS of assignment incorrectly suggests turning missing variable into a type name. #57157
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix ServiceHub Core host option #57223
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Always set BuildingInsideVisualStudio when loading MSBuild workspace #57219
    Area-IDE
  • [hackathon] Support for ValueArray in C# escape analysis. #57218
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert BG install of nuget packages #57217
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57215
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Force nuget install/uninstall to happen on UI thread #57214
    Area-IDE
  • Compute val escape for extended property patterns #57211
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Extended Property Patterns
  • Explainer for list-patterns #57210
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • List patterns: Use the base node to share code #57207
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Fix VisualStudioActiveDocumentTracker to handle VSSELELEMID.SEID_Wind… #57206
    Area-IDE
  • Honor suppression on switch expression #57204
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Implement 'Enable nullable reference types' refactoring #57200
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Handle 'out'. Add some metadata decoding. #57163
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure that async add-using works with incomplete members #57212
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Record status for "newlines in interpolations" #57155
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57182
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Share UnnecessaryCodeFormatDefinition with VS Mac #57193
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Ensure low-pri fixes go in the right async lightbulb bucket. #57171
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Remove cancellation token from tagging context object. #57167
    Area-IDE
  • Handle symbols from metadata in OverloadResolution.IsValidParams() #57201
    Area-Compilers

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57225
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57224
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move skeleton ref caching to ProjectStates #57158
    Area-IDE
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Initial fix for issue "VB Formatting of LineContinuation Wrong after _ ' Comment" #54559
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Adding some additional tests and asserts #57164
    Area-IDE
  • Check constraints on lifted operator types #57050
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement an LspWorkspaceManager and modify how we fork documents in LSP. #57140
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: counterexample for non-exhaustive switch expressions #55327
    Area-Compilers
  • Completion options4 #57139
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Ensure new files are formatted based on the right language version #57119
    Area-IDE
  • Allow newlines in the holes inside interpolated strings #56853
    Area-Compilers, Compiler.Next
  • Support params Span<T> #57078
    Area-Compilers
  • Binder.CreateConversion - Report use-site diagnostics for the entire conversion hierarchy. #57175
    Area-Compilers
  • Move search under tabs #57188
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Remove unnecessary Symbol type checks #57181
    Area-Compilers
  • Build more projects during source-build #57165
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement for compiler analyzer execution #56844
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Fix for "Function pointer invocation has "None" IOperation" #57191
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Ignore a commit with mostly indent changes #57190
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix generator caching in compiler server #57177
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements (Part 1) #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
